00019 /*!\fn int GetMaxCompressedLen( int nLenSrc ) 
00020 *\brief Return the maximum compressed size
00021 *\param nLenSrc
00022 *\return The size in bytes
00023 */
00024 int GetMaxCompressedLen( int nLenSrc ) 
00025 {
00026     int n16kBlocks = (nLenSrc+16383) / 16384; // round up any fraction of a block
00027     return ( nLenSrc + 6 + (n16kBlocks*5) );
00028 } /* GetMaxCompressedLen */
00029 
00030 
00031 
00032 /*!\fn int CompressData( unsigned char *abSrc, int nLenSrc, unsigned char *abDst, int nLenDst )
00033 *\brief Compress a string to another
00034 *\param abSrc source string
00035 *\param nLenSrc size of source string
00036 *\param abDst destination string
00037 *\param nLenDst destination length
00038 *\return -1 or lenght of output
00039 */
00040 int CompressData( unsigned char *abSrc, int nLenSrc, unsigned char *abDst, int nLenDst )
00041 {
00042     z_stream zInfo ={0};
00043     zInfo.total_in=  zInfo.avail_in = nLenSrc;
00044     zInfo.total_out= zInfo.avail_out= nLenDst;
00045     zInfo.next_in= (unsigned char *)abSrc;
00046     zInfo.next_out= abDst;
00047 
00048     int nErr, nRet= -1;
00049     nErr= deflateInit( &zInfo, Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION ); // zlib function
00050     if ( nErr == Z_OK ) {
00051         nErr= deflate( &zInfo, Z_FINISH );              // zlib function
00052         if ( nErr == Z_STREAM_END ) {
00053             nRet= zInfo.total_out;
00054         }
00055     }
00056     deflateEnd( &zInfo );    // zlib function
00057     return( nRet );
00058 } /* CompressData */
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062 /*!\fn int UncompressData( unsigned char *abSrc, int nLenSrc, unsigned char *abDst, int nLenDst )
00063 *\brief Uncompress a string to another
00064 *\param abSrc source string
00065 *\param nLenSrc size of source string
00066 *\param abDst destination string
00067 *\param nLenDst destination length
00068 *\return -1 or lenght of output
00069 */
00070 int UncompressData( unsigned char *abSrc, int nLenSrc, unsigned char *abDst, int nLenDst )
00071 {
00072     z_stream zInfo ={0};
00073     zInfo.total_in=  zInfo.avail_in=  nLenSrc;
00074     zInfo.total_out= zInfo.avail_out= nLenDst;
00075     zInfo.next_in= (unsigned char *)abSrc;
00076     zInfo.next_out= abDst;
00077 
00078     int nErr, nRet= -1;
00079     nErr= inflateInit( &zInfo );               // zlib function
00080     if ( nErr == Z_OK ) 
00081                 {
00082         nErr= inflate( &zInfo, Z_FINISH );     // zlib function
00083         nRet= zInfo.total_out;
00084         if ( nErr != Z_STREAM_END && nErr != Z_OK ) 
00085                                 {
00086                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "ZLIB:inflate: %s (%d)" , zError( nErr ) );
00087                                 }
00088     }
00089                 else
00090                 {
00091                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "ZLIB:inflateInit: %s (%d)" , zError( nErr ) );
00092                 }
00093     inflateEnd( &zInfo );   // zlib function
00094     return( nRet ); // -1 or len of output
00095 } /* UncompressData */

00099 /*!\fn N_STR *zip_nstr( N_STR *src )
00100 *\param src The source string
00101 *\return The compressed string or NULL
00102 */
00103 N_STR *zip_nstr( N_STR *src )
00104 {
00105                 int zip_max_size = GetMaxCompressedLen( src -> length );
00106                 /* storage for original string size + zipped string  + padding */
00107                 N_STR *zipped = new_nstr( 4 + zip_max_size + 64 );
00108                 /* copying size */
00109                 int32_t src_length = htonl( src -> length );
00110                 memcpy( zipped -> data , &src_length , sizeof( int32_t ) );
00111 
00112                 char *dataptr =  zipped -> data + 4 ;
00113                 zipped -> written = 8 + CompressData( (unsigned char *)src -> data , src -> written , (unsigned char *)dataptr , zip_max_size );
00114                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Size: zip :%d original:%d" , zipped -> written , src -> length );
00115                 
00116                 return zipped ;
00117 } /* zip_nstr */
00118 
00119 
00120 
00121 /*!\fn N_STR *unzip_nstr( N_STR *src )
00122 *\param src The source string
00123 *\return The uncompressed string or NULL
00124 */
00125 N_STR *unzip_nstr( N_STR *src )
00126 {
00127                 int32_t original_size = 0 ;
00128                 memcpy( &original_size , src -> data , sizeof( int32_t ) );
00129                 original_size = ntohl( original_size );
00130                 /* storage for original string size + zipped string  + padding */
00131                 N_STR *unzipped = new_nstr( original_size + 64 );
00132                 /* copying size */
00133                 unzipped -> written = UncompressData( ((unsigned char *)src -> data) + 4 , src -> written , (unsigned char *)unzipped -> data , original_size + 64 );
00134                 n_log( LOG_DEBUG , "Size: zip: %d => unzip :%d original:%d" , src -> written , unzipped -> written , original_size );
00135                 
00136                 return unzipped ;
00137 } /* unzip_nstr */
